section: THIS JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") made and entered into this 20th day of Friday, March 2020 (the "Execution Date"),
explanation: Having 'Friday, March 2020' is structurally flawed. The 20th day of March 2020 was a Friday, so it appears the author has provided the day of the week as well as the full date. It should either provide the day of the week, or the full date.

section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This statement is too broad and vague. It doesn't define what constitutes the 'purpose' of the venture or set any limitations or guidelines for the Managers' determination. This lack of specificity can lead to disagreements and uncertainties regarding the Venture's scope and objectives.

section: All Members will contribute their respective Capital Contributions fully and on time.
explanation: This statement introduces ambiguity because it does not state when they will be contributing the funds by. There are no dates listed for when they will be contributing the funds, which can lead to disagreement.
